meanings.definition: A person who believes in the ultimate destiny of humanity to live in outer space.
meanings.sent1: The cosmist dreamed of a future where humans colonized distant planets.
meanings.sent2: She met a cosmist at the space conference who shared her vision of space exploration.
meanings.sent3: The cosmist joked that their ideal vacation spot was Mars.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared like a cosmist envisioning a universe teeming with life.
meanings.sent5: The cosmist's passion for space travel was as bright as a shooting star.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the belief in the ultimate destiny of humanity to live in outer space.
meanings.sent1: The cosmist vision of a space-faring society inspired many to look up at the stars.
meanings.sent2: His cosmist ideas about space colonization were ahead of their time.
meanings.sent3: The cosmist-themed party had guests dressed as astronauts and aliens.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a galaxy of cosmist thoughts, exploring the cosmos within.
meanings.sent5: The cosmist perspective painted the universe in hues of hope and wonder.
